steps: Whisk ['ing']{All-purpose flour}, ['ing']{Matcha powder}, ['ing']{Baking powder}, ['ing']{Baking soda}, and ['ing']{Pinch of salt}. Set aside.
In a large bowl, whisk 95g melted ['ing']{Unsalted butter} + ['ing']{Granulated sugar}. Add ['ing']{Medium egg} + ['ing']{Vanilla extract}, then the milk mixture.
Gently fold dry ingredients into wet until just mixed.
Cover and refrigerate batter for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to ['temp']{200}. Line 6 muffin cups (for tall tops).
Scoop chilled batter (fill liners almost to the top).
Bake 20–25 min until tops spring back.
Let sit 5–10 minutes before transferring to a rack.
